metadata.title: CVE-2022-20502 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In GetResolvedMethod of entrypoint_utils-inl.h, there is a possible use after free due to a stale cache. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-222166527

criterions.comment: android-platform-art package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-tools package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
